featured.text: Which of the following is the best title for the article? (A) Mating of Flashlight Fish and Fireflies.

definition.zh_def: 交配；動物或植物繁殖的過程。
definition.en_def: The process of pairing for reproduction, typically involving the union of male and female organisms.
definition.example: The birds are mating in the spring to raise their young.
